main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimEC] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:34:22 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblDimEC]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblDimEC]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].tblDimEC] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:34:22 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblDimEC]( [DimPoolID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimECID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [CriteriaName] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [CriteriaDescription] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [CriteriaSetId] [bigint] NOT NULL, [CriteriaSetTypeCode] [nvarchar] (200) NOT NULL, [DimOrganisationId] [Bigint] NOT NULL, [CriteriaTypeCode] [nvarchar] (200) NOT NULL, [IsEnabled] [bit] NOT NULL, [ECPassNoCode] [nvarchar] (200) NOT NULL, [XMLSqlQueryEC] [xml] NOT NULL, [XMLSqlQueryDrillThrough] [xml] NULL, [CriteriaTableTypeCode] [nvarchar] (200) NULL, [SequenceNo] int NULL, [IsFunctionEnabled] [bit] default 1, [IsEditable] [bit] default 1 CONSTRAINT [PK_tblDimEC] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimPoolID] ASC, [DimECID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 70) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
